sentence.Network_en: Stripped of their pretentious verbiage, his statements come dangerously close to inviting racial hatred.
sentence.Network_cn: 抛开那些夸大其词的冗词赘语不论，他的言论有挑起种族仇恨的危险。

sentence.Network_en: The speaker lost himself in verbiage.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个人演讲叠床架屋兴头十足.

PerfectNetExp.abs: v字仇杀队那段都是V的经典台词 ... ) vichyssoise - 奶油浓汤 ) verbiage - 空话 ) veer - 转向的.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... appendage 附加物 verbiage 罗嗦，冗长 foliage 叶子（总称）.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... alienage 外国人身份 verbiage 冗词，赘语 visage 面貌.
用语_百度百科 ... [terms;phraseologe] 某个行业或专业的专门术语 [verbiage] 措辞 [choice of words;wording] 词语的选择或运用.

list.abs: it takes account of its audience , offering explanations where requisite , and avoiding specialized jargon and unnecessary verbiage .它考虑到了其读者，提供了必要的解释，并避免专业术语和不必要的空话。
in vocabulary so common , you cannot get lost in the verbiage .以如此平凡的语汇，让你不致迷失在冗词中。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, from obsolete verbeier 'to chatter', from verbe 'word' (see verb)

entry.def: If you refer to someone's  speech or writing as verbiage, you are critical of them because they use too many words, which makes their speech or writing difficult to understand.

example.ex: Stripped of their pretentious verbiage, his statements come dangerously close to inviting racial hatred.
example.tran: 抛开那些夸大其词的冗词赘语不论，他的言论有挑起种族仇恨的危险。

means.word_mean: 2. the manner in which something is expressed in words;

auth_sentence.content: Condon was ready with a smoke-screen of verbiage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Condon was ready with a smoke-screen of verbiage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Condon was ready with a smoke-screen of verbiage.

auth_sentence.content: Volumes of verbiage does not substitute for facts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Volumes of verbiage does not substitute for facts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Volumes of verbiage does not substitute for facts.

auth_sentence.content: No amount of verbiage and bluster can diminish the truth.
auth_sentence.res_content: No amount of verbiage and bluster can diminish the truth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No amount of verbiage and bluster can diminish the truth.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态
ad加+verb[n.动词]→加在动词前→副词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 谚语的, 谚语式的, 众所周知的, 公认的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proverb[n.谚语,格言,箴言]+ial……的→adj.谚语的, 谚语式的, 众所周知的, 公认的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用言辞的,用文字的;口头的;动词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: verb词语+al……的→adj.用言辞的,用文字的;口头的;动词的
verb词语+atim→来自拉丁文:word for word
verb词语+ose多……的→多词的
verb词语+atim→来自拉丁文:word for word
ad加+verb[n.动词]→加在动词前→副词
pro前面+verb词语→放在前面的词→格言
verb词语→n.动词
verbi=verb词语+age状态→词的状态→冗长
